DataElement.preferredName: Colon Polyp Index Date To Diagnosis Day Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Number of days between the date used for index and the date the patient was diagnosed with colon polyps.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Colon Polyp Index Date To Diagnosis Day
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A polypoid lesion that arises from the colon and protrudes into the lumen.  This group includes adenomatous polyps, serrated polyps, and hamartomatous polyps._A date used as a reference point for ensuing events, often a diagnosis date, or a first visit date, or the date a patient enrolled in a study._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation._The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A polypoid lesion that arises from the colon and protrudes into the lumen

Concepts.definition: A polypoid lesion that arises from the colon and protrudes into the lumen.  This group includes adenomatous polyps, serrated polyps, and hamartomatous polyps.

Concepts.definition: A date used as a reference point for ensuing events, often a diagnosis date, or a first visit date, or the date a patient enrolled in a study.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
